data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Bulbothrix Hale: the species with medullary salazinic acid lacking vegetative propagules

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Benatti, Michel N. (2012): A review of the genus Bulbothrix Hale: the species with medullary salazinic acid lacking vegetative propagules. MycoKeys 5: 1-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.5.3342, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.5.3342
